title: TBOY PE LEVE - SEMBA & KIZOMBA IMMERSION - 8H WORKSHOPS, NOV 28-29th 2015
desc: Today he teaches Kizomba/Semba weekly at Salsabor, famous school in Paris, France. ?He also partner up with Victor de Sousa named Victor Kizomba.fr who is one of the first kizomba teacher in France since 2009.. Additionally, T boy is the leader of "Semba na Rua" in Paris. Semba na rua is a project of dancing in the different open places in Paris in order to dance freely and show to the public these dances coming ?from africa. As well as P? Leve?s, a dance project based in Paris founded with the purpose of keeping the tradition of Kizomba alive in France.? ?Through his way in the kizomba, he had the pleasure of performing and teaching with Ms. Nogueira. Inspired and passionate , he is willing to share now his passion, dance skills and knowledge with us. ? FACEBOOK :?https://www.facebook.com/tboy.peleve.9 ? YOUTUBE CHANNEL :?https://www.youtube.com/user/TBOYKENSKYELYSEE/videos ? ? CONTACT INFORMATION : DAVID CAMPOS (646) 734 8543 davidcamposkizomba@gmail.com www.davidcampos.fr
